data.text: @wtrbfflo @PhilipSoos @Harvard2H The silence on medical tyranny, primarily airborne transmission, and effective mitigation, including ventilation, CO2 monitoring, indoor air sanitation, and oral/nasopharyngeal hygiene,... deafening. Destructive absolute "expert" thinking, as if there are only two "tribes," wow.
@TaNaishaJ @Harvard2H @PhilipSoos I’d like to be a fly on the wall if something like this ever happens. Trying to get a few other folks to do a similar talk. No traction yet!

@TaNaishaJ @PhilipSoos @Harvard2H This is most of the people I know, if they’re thinking about it at all:

Someone needs to dumb it down.  most of pop needs help
